description: Jessy proposes a plan on how to utilize community resources for a neighborhood garden project, and Bob must decide whether to back the plan.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Allocate 70% of the garden space for Bob's preferred plants
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Allocate 70% of space to their own preferred plants

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the garden plan and proceed with implementation
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Reject the plan, stalling the project
